name: Mercedes Benz CLS
snippet: From its muscular stance to its scintillating details, the CLS combines power and poise to be a true Mercedes-Benz coupe.

name: Audi A7 Sportback
snippet: Audi has seen the success of the CLS and - whisper it - Panamera, and now it wants a bit of the action itself. Enter the recently facelifted A7 Sportback.
